content: elevation yoga socks are great for yoga pilates and other exercises these toeless and heelless socks will keep your feet warm during your yoga practice still allowing you to grip the mat or floor they are also great to wear after a pedicure if you are intimidated by knitting socks you can begin with this simple pattern since there is no heel and toe it s an easy and quick project for beginners these socks are a quick knitting project and they make a cute little gift
